editable022: With our dry steam option we will whip away dirt, dissolve grease and kill germs, while using no chemicals. This can be achieved on almost every surface with great results. Let's be green together.
editable023: Are your windows lacking that sparkle they deserve? Let us give that clean and clear treatment that your facility windows need. Our window cleaning system will leave nothing behind but sparkling glass and clean sills.

editable029: When your VCT, concrete & natural stone flooring needs restoration, we have the experience and right equipment to take care of the job. Let us strip & refinish or grind & hone with the least amount of disruption to your daily activities.
